comment._content: Same guy? www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163915618/ I'm not so sure.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
Possibly George Ellsworth Pexton (1863-1939), I will have to do more research. He is listed as "George T. Pexton" at "The Political Graveyard" but that may be an error.

"The last name on the roll call of the Republican national committee is that of George E. Pexton, member for the State of Wyoming."

Source:
Washington Post; May 9, 1911
